pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/python-script-manager/badge/?version=latest)](https://python-script-manager.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)# Welcome to PSM## What is PSM?**PSM** is a tool that helps you to manage and develop your Python apps easily.## Learn more about PSMFull documentation is available at readthedocs:[python-script-manager.readthedocs.io](https://python-script-manager.readthedocs.io)
